issues.description: No value proposition exists due to designer failures - customers won't understand what LaunchBase does or why they need it
issues.rationale: Missing core messaging framework prevents any conversion potential

issues.description: Zero pricing tiers communicated - small business owners can't evaluate affordability or choose appropriate plan
issues.rationale: Pricing opacity creates immediate abandonment for cost-conscious SMBs

issues.description: No differentiation from competitors established - appears as generic SaaS with no unique selling points
issues.rationale: Small businesses need clear reasons to switch from existing solutions

issues.description: Missing trust signals and social proof - no testimonials, case studies, or credibility markers for risk-averse SMBs
issues.rationale: Small businesses require validation before committing to new software

issues.description: No objection handling for implementation complexity - SMBs fear disruption to existing workflows
issues.rationale: Unaddressed setup concerns cause high bounce rates

issues.description: Absent ROI messaging - small businesses can't calculate value or justify expense to stakeholders
issues.rationale: SMBs need concrete financial benefits to approve purchases

issues.description: No feature comparison matrix - buyers can't understand what's included at each pricing level
issues.rationale: Confusion about features leads to decision paralysis

issues.description: Missing urgency triggers - no limited-time offers or scarcity messaging to drive immediate action
issues.rationale: SMBs postpone decisions without compelling time constraints

issues.description: No risk reversal offered - absence of free trials or money-back guarantees increases purchase friction
issues.rationale: Risk-averse small businesses need safety nets

issues.description: Support availability not communicated - SMBs worry about being stuck without help when issues arise
issues.rationale: Small businesses need reassurance about ongoing assistance

suggestedFixes.fix: Create headline: 'Launch Your Business Online in 7 Days - No Tech Skills Required' with clear SMB benefit
suggestedFixes.rationale: Addresses time-to-value and technical barrier objections immediately

suggestedFixes.fix: Display 3 tiers: Starter ($29/mo), Growth ($79/mo), Scale ($149/mo) with monthly/annual toggle prominently
suggestedFixes.rationale: Transparent pricing reduces friction and matches SMB budget expectations

suggestedFixes.fix: List 3 unique benefits: '90% faster than competitors, no-code setup, dedicated SMB success team'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clear differentiation helps justify switching costs for small businesses

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 5 SMB testimonials with business name, photo, and specific metric improvements above fold
suggestedFixes.rationale: Social proof from peers reduces perceived risk significantly

suggestedFixes.fix: Add FAQ section: 'Setup in 30 minutes', 'Works with existing tools', 'No downtime during switch'
Display ROI calculator showing 'Average customer saves 10 hours/week and $500/month in operational costs'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Quantifiable returns help SMBs justify investment internally

suggestedFixes.fix: Create feature matrix showing included features, user limits, and support levels per tier clearly
suggestedFixes.rationale: Transparency accelerates decision-making for comparison shoppers

suggestedFixes.fix: Add banner: 'Limited Launch Offer - 50% off first 3 months, expires in 72 hours' with countdown
suggestedFixes.rationale: Time pressure converts fence-sitters into buyers

suggestedFixes.fix: Prominently display '30-day money-back guarantee + 14-day free trial, no credit card required'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Risk reversal removes final purchase barriers for cautious SMBs

suggestedFixes.fix: Add support badge: '24/7 chat support + dedicated onboarding specialist for all new customers'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guaranteed help reduces anxiety about post-purchase problems
